sense.name: help grow
sense.examples: They nurtured his talents as a virtuoso. The parents nurtured their children to adulthood. The child's abilities were nurtured by school. The gardener nurtured the plants so they would become big and strong. The old woman nurtured the kitten into a cat.

sense.name: nourish or sustain
sense.examples: The bread was nurturing to the weary travelers. The soldier was nurtured by the hot soup. This kind of food is not nurturing for young children. Vegetables nurture a body. The plants were nurtured by a dose of fertilizer.
